channel.title: Manage Costs :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Introduction Managing Observability costs is a huge challenge. Users can send in data at will, change data, turn on new integrations, and incur costs that are hard to detect before the surprise overage at the end of the month. Exactly the kind of thing that’s likely to happen to this new team as they set up their new application. Let’s walk through some ways we can mitigate those challenges, while still making the platform easy for teams to send the data they need to.
